title: Shorts: Alice Bettany from Sacred Seeds Herbal Project
subtitle: Shorts: Alice Bettany from Sacred Seeds Herbal Project
summary:
the 2018 Oxford Real Farming Conference last month featured a panel on growing and selling herbs in the UK. It addressed a real need for suppliers of good quality Uk-grown herbs.

In this Short, Abby Rosie spoke to Alice Bettany from the Sacred Seeds Herbal project, who was a participant in the panel. She runs a herb box-scheme based on a CSA model which is currently the only herbal box scheme in the UK. Alice talks to us about her work and her mission to bring back herbal medicine to the people.

This short begins with a beautiful description of her own garden, topped to the brim with Medicinal herbs. 

Other panellists from the ORFC2018 panel on herbs can be heard in episode 31 of Farmerama.
